short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to restore OGP link cards on Twitter (X).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitter (X) removed headings from links in tweets (posts) on October 4, 2023. This extension restores the removed headlines and restores the previous ease of use.
